title: Divorce and young people
creator_credit: Nick Vincent and Golden Coast Film Productions
brief_description: Depicts some of the most common fears, conflicts and problems that children face when their parents are going through divorce and demonstrates certain methods of coping with the various emotions that arise. Offers solutions to the problems that children find most difficult to solve in a divorce situation.
